sentences.english: I will leave aside, for the moment, what happens on Friday and Saturday nights.
sentences.chinese: 咱们暂时不要考虑，星期五，星期六的夜晚。

sentences.english: They've already implanted electrodes into blind patients on a temporary basis, allowing them to see flashes of light.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经为盲者植入暂时的义眼，让他们能看到闪光。

sentences.english: Has the purple devoted to encourage and comfort can only temporarily soothe her injured heart.
sentences.chinese: 曾紫陌的鼓励和安慰也只能暂时稍稍安抚她受伤的心。

sentences.english: Vedanta defines the real as being permanent and the unreal as being temporary.
sentences.chinese: 韦丹塔界定真正作为常任理事国和虚幻是暂时的。

sentences.english: Even my preferred product is currently out-of-stock , I am still loyal to the website.
sentences.chinese: 即使我喜爱的商品暂时缺货，我仍然会忠诚于此网站。

sentences.english: Would you be kind enough to chenge to another seat?
sentences.chinese: 请您暂时回到指定的位置上好吗？

sentences.english: Yesterday was the last time for me to play the Jpananese drams before the spectators.
sentences.chinese: 在众人面前的演奏昨天也迎来了其暂时的帷幕。

sentences.english: An appropriate number of rooms in another hotel must be tentatively reserved.
sentences.chinese: 须在另一家酒店暂时预订适当的房间数。

sentences.english: Members of the Ampatuan family couldn't be reached to comment.
sentences.chinese: 记者暂时无法联系到安帕图安家族成员进行置评。

sentences.english: I was with Tomas, a friend who'd lived with us for a while when he had been renovating his own house.
sentences.chinese: 有个朋友叫托马斯，在他翻新房子时暂时住在我们这。

sentences.english: Black temporarily at cousin and good li-li jins asylum.
sentences.chinese: “黑皮”暂时在表妹和相好的金莉莉家避难。

sentences.english: But experts say the plan will temporarily increase the amount of oil flowing into the Gulf.
sentences.chinese: 但专家说，这个计划将暂时增加油量流进海湾。

sentences.english: The train crossing was temporarily closed due to an accident.
sentences.chinese: 火车辙叉处由于发生事故被暂时关闭。

sentences.english: The teenager had been detained after the traffic incident.
sentences.chinese: 当时少年曾由于那起交通事故被暂时羁留。

sentences.english: In LeiJinYi housekeeper led temporarily first in PengGu lived.
sentences.chinese: 雷锦仪在管家的率领下暂时先在彭家住了下来。

definition: only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
as quickly as possible/as soon as possible/with all speed
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
to do with difficulty/to force sb to do sth/reluctant/barely enough
despite/although/even though/in spite of/unhesitatingly/do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc)/(go ahead and do it) without hesitating
